segments.text: My pal , you are so nervous recently . You don't need to be like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am worried about that Arden will display all my drawbacks in the performance review . That will be embarrassing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just use your head . If you were definitely making some big mistakes , you would be informed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had a nightmare last night and I dreamt Arden told me that my performance fell short of his expectation . I was terrified to wake up after hearing that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is merely a dream . Remember , there is always room for us to have further improvement . I think we did the good job in the whole period .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know what you are talking about . The performance evaluation process starts from the day we're hired . There is no surprise during the actual review .
segments.speaker: S2
